column4: turning off autologin will stop the keyring password (this is a security feature), not sure what options there are for VNC - i know with nm-applet you can select unsecure storage and keyring won't come up, not sure about vnc.  best of luck.
thx but the thing is that the server is running WLAN so I guess there is no internet connection before login ?
um, if you are using nm-applet that can certainly be an issue.  sorry man, i'm no help.
ok well I have never to do a reboot then :D :D
